title: Search Items
steps:
1. Type name of item to the search bar
2. Enter key and search button should work as confirmation of searching
steps_expected_result:
1. Some results are already showing in autocomplete box
2. Page of items should load

title: Browse Items
steps:
1. Click on section of items
2. Check items if there are 3 columns of items and 9 rows on page
3. If there are more than 27 items under category, click on second page at the bottom of the list of items
4. Check if there aren’t problem with wrong assignment to category
steps_expected_result:
1. Should load page with items of that section
2. 
3. Should load next page of items
4. Catagory should contain only items that belongs to that specific category

title: View Item
steps:
1. Browse item and click on some item
2. Search item and click on one
3. Open shopping cart and click on item in it
steps_expected_result:
1. Should load page of item
2. Should load page of item
3. Should load page of item

title: Add Item to Shopping Cart
steps:
1. Take a look at list of items in some category and click on button “Add to the cart” without viewing the item
2. View some item and click on “Add to the cart” button
steps_expected_result:
1. Item should be added to the shopping cart
2. Item should be added to the shopping cart

title: View/Update Shopping Cart
steps:
1. View shopping cart by clicking on icon
2. Change quantity

title: Checkout
steps: 1. In shopping cart, click on checkout button
steps_expected_result: 1. Should load page with personal information about delivery address, payment method etc.
comment: Page didn't load, just white blank page

title: Remove Item from Shopping Cart
steps: 1. In shopping cart, click on remove button next to an item
steps_expected_result: 1. Item should be removed from the shopping cart
